summary: The team discussed classifying DEV-001, determining it is not an NFR as it involves pure documentation rather than code optimizations. Mike suggested options to reclassify it as a user story with code or move it to non-story documentation, voting for the latter to keep the backlog focused, and inquired about approving SP-001 without changes.

actions.task: Provide thoughts on DEV-001 classification and approval of SP-001
